name: part_002
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Zeta showcases her 3D chibi model and the character "Bazo" sitting on her head.
Zeta demonstrates a "sad" emote, performing a dramatic, exaggerated crying act.
Zeta shows more expressions and explains how her movements are limited in the chibi form.
Zeta takes on a "Gaki" (bratty) persona with a smug facial expression.
Zeta shares her excitement for the stream's planned content, including free talk and songs.
